thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-KBR To Utilize PCMAX Technology For New Polycarbonate Project In China

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-KBR To Utilize PCMAX Technology For New Polycarbonate Project In China

organizations.name: pcmax technology for new polycarbonate project in china feb

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - KBR Inc:
* KBR WILL UTILIZE INNOVATIVE PCMAX™ TECHNOLOGY FOR NEW POLYCARBONATE PROJECT IN CHINA
* KBR INC - ‍IT HAS BEEN AWARDED BOTH A LICENSE AND ENGINEERING (LBED) AND A EQUIPMENT SUPPLY CONTRACT BY CANGZHOU DAHUA NEW MATERIALS CO., LTD​
* KBR INC - ‍AWARDED BOTH LICENSE AND ENGINEERING (LBED) AND EQUIPMENT SUPPLY CONTRACT TO BUILD NEW POLYCARBONATE PLANT IN CANGZHOU CITY, CHINA​
* KBR INC-REVENUE ASSOCIATED WITH PROJECT WAS BOOKED INTO BACKLOG OF UNFILLED ORDERS FOR KBR‘S TECHNOLOGY AND CONSULTING BUSINESS SEGMENT IN Q4 OF 2017​
* KBR - ‍UNDER TERMS OF 2 CONTRACTS,TO PROVIDE PCMAX TECHNOLOGY,AMONG OTHERS FOR 100,000 METRIC TONNES PER ANNUM SINGLE TRAIN PLANT IN CANGZHOU​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
